category.name: ProductView
category.category_description: Preferences affecting the behavior of Product views

preference.name: Vis_PV_ImageCapture
preference.preference_description: Indicates whether an Image Capture should be added when a Product View is created. It also specifies how the Image Capture options will be obtained if one is created. Valid values are "NoImageCapture", "CaptureUsingPrefs" or "CaptureUsingDialog".
